reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions collecting various data types from users.
reply.reference: You means the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service, as applicable. Usage data is automatically gathered as you interact with our service. This data encompasses various details, including your device's Internet Protocol (IP) address, browser type, browser version, specific pages visited on our service, date and time of your visit, duration of your stay on those pages, unique device identifiers, and other diagnostic information. If you access our service URL: https://www.joysmoremobile.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects data such as images and other data from the device's camera, as well as audio, electronic, visual, thermal, olfactory, or similar information, and sensitive personal information like account login and password information and geolocation data.

content: Images and other data from the device's camera
Audio, electronic, visual, thermal, olfactory, or similar information
Sensitive personal information like account login and password information and geolocation data

reply.analysis: The types of data collected include camera images, various sensory information, and sensitive personal data like account login and geolocation.
reply.reference: Images and other data from your Device's camera. Collected: No.; Sensitive personal information. Collected: Yes. URL: https://www.joysmoremobile.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app outlines practices and protocols for gathering, utilizing, and revealing data while using the Service, including informing users about their privacy rights and legal protections. It also mentions various specific purposes for collecting data.
reply.reference: This Privacy Policy outlines Our practices and protocols for gathering, utilizing, and revealing Your data while You make use of the Service. It also informs You about Your privacy rights and the legal protections in place. ... reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, users can opt out of data collection or request the deletion of their data. Users have the ability to submit opt-out requests to stop the selling of personal information, request corrections to inaccurate information, limit the use or disclosure of sensitive personal data, and delete their personal data under certain circumstances.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy outlines the various rights users have, including the right to opt out of data collection or delete their data under certain circumstances.
reply.reference: To submit an opt-out request, please refer to the Do Not Sell My Personal Information section or contact us. You can exercise your rights of access, rectification, erasure, and objection by reaching out to us. Please be aware that we may require you to verify your identity before addressing such requests. Upon receiving your request, we will make every effort to respond to you promptly. URL: https://www.joysmoremobile.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app shares hashed email addresses or other identifiers with third-party vendors for cross-device and browser ad delivery, partners with third-party vendors for remarketing such as Google Ads, and shares information with affiliates, business partners, and other users.
reply.reference: We may also share hashed email addresses or other identifiers with third-party vendors to facilitate cross-device and browser ad delivery. For specifics on the technology and cross-device capabilities of these vendors, please refer to their individual privacy policies. We partner with the following third-party vendors for remarketing: Google Ads (AdWords): Managed by Google Inc.; With Affiliates: We may share your information with our affiliates, Business Partners: We may share your information with our business partners; With Other Users: Information you share or interactions in public areas with other users may be viewed by all users and may be publicly distributed outside our Service. URL: https://www.joysmoremobile.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: Affiliates, Business Partners, Other Users, Third-party vendors, Service Providers

extended_simple_answer.content: Affiliates, Business Partners, Other Users, Third-party vendors, Service Providers

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app shares data with various third parties, including affiliates, business partners, other users, third-party vendors, and service providers.
reply.reference: With Affiliates: We may share your information with our affiliates, with the expectation that they will adhere to this Privacy Policy. This includes our parent company and any subsidiaries, joint venture partners, or other entities under common control. Business Partners: We may share your information with our business partners to offer specific products, services, or promotions. With Other Users: Information you share or interactions in public areas with other users may be viewed by all users and may be publicly distributed outside our Service. With Service Providers: Sharing your personal information with Service Providers to analyze and monitor our Service usage, support and maintain our Service, advertise to you after visiting our Service, process payments, and communicate with you. URL: https://www.joysmoremobile.com/privacy-policy
